alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued July 15 at 7:22AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...High Surf Warning remains in effect... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 12 to 15 feet, with surfs up to 20 feet, will impact west, south and east facing shores exposed to the large southerly swells and strong tradewinds. * WHERE...All Islands of American Samoa. * WHEN...through Tonight. * IMPACTS...High. Expect ocean water sweeping beaches, very strong breaking waves, and strong longshore and potentially deadly rip currents. Significant coastal erosion is also likely. Large waves may bring ocean debris onto roadways, and will impact small harbors, making navigating the harbor channel dangerous. Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 722 TAEAO ASO FARAILE IULAI 15 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu matua maualuluga ma malolosi e 12 i le 15 futu, ma galu e oo atu i le 20 futu le maululuga, e aafia ai talafatai i Sisifo, Saute ma Sasa`e. O nei galu maualuluga e mafua mai i auma tetele mai i saute, faapea foi ma le malosi o le agi o le tuaoloa. * NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Faraile. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga Maualuga. E matua maualuluga ma malolosi le fafati o galu, faapea le malosi o le aave o le sami. E solo gataifale. O galu tetele ma maululuga, e ono faatafea mai i uta otaota o le sami. E ono aafia ai fo`i uafu laiti, ma faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O galu maualuluga ma le malosi o le aave o le sami e aafia ai le soifuaga o le tagata. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia lenei lapataiga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Large, breaking surf, significant shorebreak, coastal erosion, and dangerous currents make entering the water very hazardous. Anyone entering the water could face significant injury or death.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
